Text: The Feast at Solhaug (or in the original Norwegian "Gildet paa Solhoug") is the first publicly successful drama by Henrik Ibsen.

2:

Text: The Feast at Solhaug:  Part of the strength and charm of this play as well as Ibsen's other early poetic works results from the style of the poetic form and the inherent melody of the old ballads for those who speak Scandinavian languages.
